content.raw: In case it helps support the hypothesis that this occurs under heavy load, I had 6 simulations last night all auto-restart at the same time, and I believe all 6 hit this issue. An earlier simulation, started on its own, appeared to be fine. I haven’t investigated very much yet though to figure out exactly what was going on, but whatever it was caused `move_base` to fail. I will update if I find out anything else that’s useful.
content.html: In case it helps support the hypothesis that this occurs under heavy load, I had 6 simulations last night all auto-restart at the same time, and I believe all 6 hit this issue. An earlier simulation, started on its own, appeared to be fine. I haven’t investigated very much yet though to figure out exactly what was going on, but whatever it was caused move_base to fail. I will update if I find out anything else that’s useful.
